items.content_html: qryn is an indie polyglot, lightweight high-performance observability stack with ClickHouse storage, designed to ingest and analyze logs, metrics and traces from any agent compatible with Loki, Prometheus, OTLP, Tempo, Elastic, InfluxDB, Opentelemetry and more! Grafana Cloud, Splunk, Datadog, Otel drop-in alternative

items.content_html: The useRef hook in React is a versatile and lightweight tool for working with references to DOM elements and for persisting values across re-renders in functional components. One of the primary use cases of useRef is to access and interact with DOM elements directly. When you create a useRef object and attach it to a JSX element .
items.title: Uzair-math/useRef-hook-react: The useRef hook in React is a versatile and lightweight tool for working with references to DOM elements and for persisting values across re-renders in functional components.  One of the primary use cases of useRef is to access and interact with DOM elements directly. When you create a useRef object and attach it to a JSX element .

items.content_html: The "An Ayah A Day Chrome Extension" is a lightweight browser extension designed to display a random ayat from the Holy Quran with details. The extension enhances user experience by providing a quick and convenient way to listen to that ayat also.
items.title: hiashraful/An-Ayah-A-Day: The "An Ayah A Day Chrome Extension" is a lightweight browser extension designed to display a random ayat from the Holy Quran with details.  The extension enhances user experience by providing a quick and convenient way to listen to that ayat also.
